head.title: FreeBSD Ports Categories Listed By Groups
head.cvs:keyword: x x x 13-July-2015 x x x

html.body:
&searchform;
Ports primarily for end-users
Accessibility (61) -- Ports to help disabled users.
Audio (902) -- Audio utilities - most require a supported sound card.
Deskutils (306) -- Various Desktop utilities.
Editors (325) -- Common text editors.
Finance (249) -- Monetary, financial and related applications.
Games (1233) -- Various and sundry amusements.
Graphics (1180) -- Graphics libraries and utilities.
Multimedia (468) -- Multimedia software.
Net-p2p (108) -- Peer to peer networking software.
Print (326) -- Utilities for dealing with printing.
Shells (46) -- Various shells (tcsh, bash, etc).
Textproc (1805) -- Text processing/search utilities.
Ports primarily for system administrators and developers
Archivers (236) -- Utilities for archiving and unarchiving data.
Databases (988) -- Database software.
Devel (5694) -- Software development utilities and libraries.
Emulators (190) -- Utilities for emulating other OS types.
Java (530) -- Java language support.
Lang (471) -- Computer languages.
Ports-mgmt (70) -- Utilities for managing ports and packages.
Security (1205) -- System security software.
Sysutils (1185) -- Various system utilities.
Ports relating to computer communications and the Internet
Comms (205) -- Communications utilities.
Dns (198) -- DNS client and server utilities.
Ftp (113) -- FTP client and server utilities.
Irc (140) -- Internet Relay Chat utilities.
Mail (774) -- Electronic mail packages and utilities.
Net (1560) -- Networking utilities.
Net-im (196) -- Instant messaging software.
Net-mgmt (343) -- Network management utilities.
News (91) -- USENET News support software.
Www (2999) -- WEB utilities (browsers, HTTP servers, etc).
Ports relating to the X Window System
X11 (515) -- X Window System based utilities.
X11-clocks (55) -- X Window System based clocks.
X11-drivers (48) -- X Window System drivers.
X11-fm (37) -- X Window System based file managers.
X11-fonts (240) -- X Window System fonts and font utilities.
X11-servers (12) -- X Window System servers.
X11-themes (157) -- X Window System themes.
X11-toolkits (278) -- X Window System based development toolkits.
X11-wm (138) -- X Window System window managers.
Ports relating to science and engineering
Astro (131) -- Applications related to astronomy.
Biology (94) -- Software related to biology.
Cad (103) -- Computer Aided Design utilities.
Math (721) -- Mathematical computation software.
Science (206) -- Scientific software.
Ports relating to human languages
Arabic (9) -- Ported software for the Arabic market.
Chinese (125) -- Ported software for the Chinese market.
French (25) -- Ported software for French countries.
German (33) -- Ported software for Germanic countries.
Hebrew (8) -- Ported software for Hebrew language.
Hungarian (13) -- Ported software for the Hungarian market.
Japanese (300) -- Ported software for the Japanese market.
Korean (39) -- Ported software for the Korean market.
Polish (21) -- Ported software for the Polish market.
Portuguese (17) -- Ported software for the Portuguese market.
Russian (50) -- Ported software for the Russian market.
Spanish (8) -- Ported software for the Spanish market.
Ukrainian (14) -- Ported software for the Ukrainian market.
Vietnamese (17) -- Ported software for the Vietnamese market.
Ports in virtual categories (secondary groupings to above)
Afterstep (26) -- Ports to support the AfterStep window manager.
Docs (20) -- Meta-ports for FreeBSD documentation.
Elisp (84) -- Things related to Emacs Lisp.
Enlightenment (38) -- Enlightenment Desktop environment.
Geography (110) -- Geography related ports.
Gnome (501) -- Components of the Gnome Desktop environment.
Gnustep (93) -- Software for GNUstep desktop environment.
Hamradio (81) -- Software for amateur radio.
Haskell (456) -- Software related to the Haskell language.
Ipv6 (342) -- IPv6 related software.
Kde (494) -- Software for the K Desktop Environment.
Kld (55) -- Kernel loadable modules.
Linux (232) -- Linux programs that can be run under binary compatibility.
Lisp (40) -- Things related to pure lisp.
Mate (34) -- Components of the MATE Desktop environment.
Mbone (2) -- Applications and utilities for the MBONE.
Parallel (33) -- Applications dealing with parallelism in computing.
Pear (530) -- Utilities/modules that fall into the PEAR system.
Perl5 (5272) -- Utilities/modules for the PERL5 language.
Plan9 (4) -- Software from the Plan9 operating system.
Python (2065) -- Software related to the Python language.
Ruby (156) -- Software related to the Ruby language.
Rubygems (1047) -- Packages for the RubyGems system.
Scheme (30) -- Software related to the Scheme language.
Tcl (70) -- TCL and packages which depend on it.
Tk (90) -- Tk and packages which depend on it.
Windowmaker (73) -- Ports to support the WindowMaker window manager.
Xfce (73) -- Ports to support the Xfce desktop environment.
Zope (252) -- Software related to the Zope platform.
All other ports
Benchmarks (85) -- Utilities for measuring system performance.
Converters (202) -- Format conversion utilities.
Misc (489) -- Miscellaneous utilities.
Palm (19) -- Software support for the Palm(tm) series.
